Full Description:
Physics for Scientists and Engineers: A Strategic Approach with Modern Physics and MasteringPhysics (2nd Edition) by Randall D. Knight

* Complete Textbook
* 1450 pages
* Publisher: Addison Wesley; 2 edition (October 19, 2007)
* Language: English
* ISBN-10: 0321513339
* ISBN-13: 978-0321513335
* DJVU Format
* 21.7 MB

Equivalent/better quality compared to the 70-700MB PDFs out there.
Thanks a lot, this is great. Quality is good, I just had to download a small program to view it. definitely recommend this if anyones having problems with physics

Have to DL a DjVu reader but other then that, awesome! 

Just saved me $200!

Thanks
